import React, { Component, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const AddExpense = ({transactions, addTransaction}) => { const [text, setText] = useState("") const [amount, setAmount] = useState(0) const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() const addedTransaction = { id: this.state.text, text: this.state.text, amount: this.state.amount } addTransaction(addedTransaction) } return (
